full_summary:
**Wharf Repair – Structure #401 - White Head (Grand Manan Island) NB**
==========================================

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Reference Number:** cb-8133-94728173
*   **Solicitation Number:** 30004691
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-08T14:00:00
*   **Location:** White Head Harbour, White Head Island, Grand Manan Island, New Brunswick
*   ** Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional

**Project Overview**
-------------------

The contract involves furnishing all plant, labour, equipment, and material to complete immediate temporary repairs or stabilization at the south end of Structure #401 due to aging infrastructure.

**Site Familiarization**
----------------------

Before submitting a proposal, bidders are recommended to visit the site and its surroundings to:

*   Review and verify the form, nature, and extent of the work
*   Obtain necessary information about risks, contingencies, and weather conditions
*   Familiarize themselves with soil conditions and any accommodations required

**Important Dates**
------------------

*   **Tender Closing Date:** September 8, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Daylight Time)
*   **Duration of Contract:** All work must be completed by March 31st, 2024

**Conditional Set-Aside**
-----------------------

This tender is open, and it will be conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more Indigenous businesses who are certified under the PSIB criteria and listed in the Indigenous Business Directory submit compliant bids. If this is the case, the contracting authority will limit the competition to these Indigenous businesses and exclude non-Indigenous businesses.

**Contracting Entity**
-------------------

*   **Name:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
*   **Address:** 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, NB E3C 2M6
*   **Contact Information:**

    *   **Contact Name:** Marie-France Chrétien
    *   **Email Address:** marie-france.chretien@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
    *   **Phone Number:** (450) 521-4448

**Additional Resources**
------------------------

The following documents are available for download:

*   ITT (English)
*   ITT (French)
*   Specifications (English)
*   Specifications (French)
*   Drawings
